<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107513</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107513</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204335</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Creating found poetry from picture books</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erstellen der gefundenen Poesie von den Abbildung 
Büchern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Créer la poésie trouvée des livres d'image</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Criando a poesia encontrada dos livros do retrato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Creazione della poesia trovata dai libri 
dell'immagine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δημιουργία της ποίησης από τα βιβλία εικόνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Crear poesía encontrada de los libros del cuadro</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students select and read a picture book and afterwards create "found poetry" based on the picture book.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer wählen aus und lesen ein Abbildung
Buch und erstellen danach "fanden Poesie" basiert auf dem Abbildung 
Buch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants choisissent et lisent un livre 
d'image et le créent après "ont trouvé la poésie" basée sur le 
livre d'image.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes selecionam e lêem um livro do 
retrato e críam-no mais tarde "encontraram a poesia" baseada no livro
do retrato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi selezionano e leggono un libro 
dell'immagine ed in seguito creano "hanno trovato la poesia" basata 
sul libro dell'immagine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές επιλέγουν και διαβάζουν ένα βιβλίο 
εικόνων και δημιουργούν κατόπιν τη "ποίηση" βασισμένη στο βιβλίο
εικόνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes seleccionan y leen un libro del 
cuadro y lo crean luego "encontraron poesía" basada en el libro del 
cuadro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107513</entry>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
